heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 1 of series 1, Station to Station

data.description: Thrilling spy drama following Daniel Miller, who is sent to Berlin on a secret mission.
data.guidance: With strong language, violence and adult themes.
data.longDescription: Daniel Miller arrives at the CIA's foreign station in Berlin in Germany on a clandestine mission - to uncover the source of a leak to a famous whistleblower.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 2 of series 1, Lights Don't Run on Loyalty
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S1: E2 - Lights Don't Run on Loyalty

data.description: Daniel pursues Shaw as Valerie and Robert gather intelligence.
data.guidance: With strong language and violence.
data.longDescription: Daniel pursues Shaw as Valerie and Robert gather intelligence on a Georgian Islamic radical in order to avoid an extraordinary rendition.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 3 of series 1, Riverrun Dry

data.description: Frost and Robert worry when investigators sweep Berlin Station.
data.guidance: With strong language and violence.
data.longDescription: Frost and Robert worry that their incriminating secrets will be unearthed when investigators sweep Berlin Station, and Daniel's hunt becomes compromised when Hector bugs his phone.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 4 of series 1, By Way of Deception
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S1: E4 - By Way of Deception

data.description: Daniel and Hector embark on a risky operation to trace the leaker.
data.guidance: With strong language and violence.
data.longDescription: Daniel and Hector embark on a risky operation to trace the source of the leaks through the computer servers of a major newspaper, and Valerie continues to spy on Aleksandre Iosava.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 5 of series 1, Unter Druck

data.description: Daniel and Esther Krug team up to get Houjin Lin out of the country.
data.guidance: Strong language, Nudity, Drug use
data.longDescription: Daniel and Esther Krug team up to secrete Chinese defector Houjin Lin - the subject of Shaw's next leak - out of the country, and Hector gets an interesting late-night visit.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 6 of series 1, Just Decisions

data.description: Valerie's investigation into Aleksandre and Ruth comes to a head.
data.guidance: Strong language, Violence, Nudity, Distressing scenes
data.longDescription: When Valerie's investigation into Aleksandre and Ruth comes to a head during a sting operation involving Hector's lover Clare Itani, Langley only succeeds in making things worse.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 7 of series 1, Proof of Life

data.description: Frost opens negotiations to secure Clare's release.
data.guidance: With very strong language, violence & scenes of a sexual nature
data.longDescription: Frost opens negotiations to secure Clare's release in the wake of the botched Iosava operation and kidnapping, and Hector goes rogue and takes Daniel with him.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 8 of series 1, False Negative

data.description: The CIA members try to cover their tracks after Clare's mission.
data.guidance: With strong language, violence, drugs & sexual content.
data.longDescription: The CIA members try to cover their tracks after their mission with Clare, and Hector finds himself in the hot seat while Robert steps in as temporary chief.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 9 of series 1, Thomas Shaw

data.description: Glimpses of Hector's past are revealed during a bid to save Patricia.
data.guidance: Very strong language, Violence, Adult content
data.longDescription: Glimpses of Hector's past are revealed as he and Daniel rush to save Patricia, and Valerie's suspicions about Robert escalate and raise tensions.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 10 of series 1, Oratorio Berlin

data.description: Daniel and the rest of the team gather evidence to uncover the truth.
data.guidance: With strong language & violence.
data.longDescription: Daniel and the rest of the team piece together evidence to uncover the truth behind Langley's involvement in the Iosava rendition while also putting Thomas Shaw to rest once and for all.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 1 of series 2, Everything's Gonna Be Alt-Right
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S2: E1 - Everything's Gonna Be Alt-Right

data.description: Berlin Station embark on an unsanctioned operation to uncover a possible terrorist attack.
data.guidance: With strong language & graphic scenes of violence.
data.longDescription: Under the direction of new Chief of Staff BB Yates, Daniel Miller, Robert Kirsch, Valerie Edwards and the rest of Berlin Station embark on an unsanctioned operation to uncover a possible terrorist attack.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 2 of series 2, Right Here, Right Now
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S2: E2 - Right Here, Right Now

data.description: Daniel uses Hector to further his mission with Otto Ganz, much to Hestor's dismay.
data.guidance: With very strong & offensive language, nudity & graphic violence.
data.longDescription: Daniel uses Hector to further his mission with Otto Ganz, much to Hestor's dismay.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 3 of series 2, Right to the Heart
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S2: E3 - Right to the Heart

data.description: Frost agrees to the Ambassador's request to spy on Berlin Station.
data.guidance: With strong language.
data.longDescription: Valerie works to obtain intel on the Far Right while Robert's teenage son Noah arrives in Berlin and asks questions. Meanwhile, Frost agrees to the Ambassador's request to spy on Berlin Station.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 4 of series 2, Do the Right Thing
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S2: E4 - Do the Right Thing

data.description: Daniel discovers a lack of trust between Otto Ganz and his daughter.
data.guidance: With very strong language
data.longDescription: BB Yates's past is revealed while she juggles keeping Berlin Station's Far Right operation covert or revealing it to Ambassador Hanes; Daniel discovers a lack of trust between Otto Ganz and his daughter.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 5 of series 2, Right of Way

data.description: Robert and Frost make plans to investigate the money trail behind the PfD's dealings.
data.guidance: With strong language and violence.
data.longDescription: The Station's sting operation to catch the Far Right in an arms deal goes horribly awry, with Otto Ganz escaping. Meanwhile, Robert and Frost make plans to investigate the money trail behind the PfD's nefarious dealings.

heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 6 of series 2, Hoeyre Hook (The Right Hook)
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S2: E6 - Hoeyre Hook (The Right Hook)

data.description: Robert and Frost travel to Norway to investigate the illegal money trail leading to PfD.
data.guidance: With strong language and violence.
data.longDescription: Robert and Frost travel to Norway to investigate the illegal money trail leading to PfD. Meanwhile, BB and Valerie devise a new plan involving a member of the Far Right.

heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 7 of series 2, Right and Wrong

data.description: Daniel tries to arrange safe passage out of Berlin for Hector with help from Esther.
data.guidance: With strong language.
data.longDescription: April weighs telling Robert about Hector's assassination plot; Daniel tries to arrange safe passage out of Berlin for Hector with help from Esther.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 8 of series 2, The Righteous One

data.description: Hector is wanted by German authorities for the assassination of Katerina Gerhardt.
data.guidance: With strong language and adult content.
data.longDescription: Hector is wanted by German authorities for the assassination of Katerina Gerhardt, but Berlin Station begins to discover there is more at play than a jaded ex-CIA officer.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 9 of series 2, Winners Right the History Books
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S2: E9 - Winners Right the History Books

data.description: Berlin Station continues to search for the truth behind Katerina Gerhardt's assassination.
data.guidance: Strong language, Violence
data.longDescription: Berlin Station continues to search for the truth behind Katerina Gerhardt's assassination and Nick Fischer's role in it, as a protest outside the US Embassy escalates.

heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 1 of series 3, Aut Concilio Aut Ense
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S3: E1 - Aut Concilio Aut Ense

data.description: Valerie Edwards sends Daniel Miller and Robert Kirsch on an urgent mission to Estonia.
data.guidance: Very strong language, Violence, Distressing scenes
data.longDescription: Valerie Edwards sends Daniel Miller and Robert Kirsch on an urgent mission to Estonia, where they meet renegade CIA Officer Rafael Torres and uncover signs of a covert invasion by Russian forces.

heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 2 of series 3, Fire Knows Nothing of Mercy
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S3: E2 - Fire Knows Nothing of Mercy

data.description: Berlin Station follows up on the evidence Kirsch brought home from his mission.
data.guidance: Strong language, Violence, Drug use
data.longDescription: Berlin Station follows up on the evidence Kirsch brought home from his mission, crystallising their theory about a possible upcoming invasion.

heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 3 of series 3, The Old Lie

data.description: Kirsch visits an old friend.
data.guidance: Strong language, Violence, Adult content
data.longDescription: The Station enlists Rafael Torres to track down a missing comrade's, Daniel Miller last known location, leading him to hostile territory. Kirsch visits an old friend.

heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 4 of series 3, If You Swear, You'll Catch No Fish
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S3: E4 - If You Swear, You'll Catch No Fish

data.description: The Explosion of a Fishing Boat is detected.
data.episodeTitle: If You Swear, You'll Catch No Fish
data.guidance: Strong language, Violence
data.longDescription: The Explosion of a Fishing Boat is detected. CIA Agent Rafael Torres violates the Station Chief of Berlin Station Orders and retrieves the burned body that he believes is of Missing CIA Agent Daniel Miller.

data.guidance: Very strong language, Violence, Nudity, Drug use
data.longDescription: Frost introduces Torres to Hector, whose new identity as a roofer to oligarchs provides a way to infiltrate the Russian elite.

data.episodeTitle: The Eye Fears When It Is Done to See
data.guidance: Very strong language, Graphic violence, Suicide
data.longDescription: April faces the loss of the tech when her assets are arrested and face deportation. Kirsch's spy swap goes horribly awry when Bruno is exchanged instead of Daniel.

heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 8 of series 3, The Green Dacha

data.description: Daniel and Hector are being hunted by Vassily Krik.
data.guidance: Very strong language, Violence, Adult content
data.longDescription: Daniel and Hector are being hunted by Vassily Krik. They manage to find shelter in a green house in the woods where a well kept secret will be revealed...

heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 9 of series 3, End of War

data.description: Frost volunteers with Valerie's reluctant consent to rescue Daniel from Krik's estate.
data.guidance: Very strong language, Violence, Adult content
data.longDescription: Frost volunteers with Valerie's reluctant consent to rescue Daniel from Krik's estate. When Daniel confronts Frost about his past alias as "Diver", shots are fired.

heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 10 of series 3, Book of the Fallen
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S3: E10 - Book of the Fallen

data.description: Mere hours remain before enemy forces topple the Estonian government.
data.guidance: Very strong language, Graphic violence, Suicide
data.longDescription: Mere hours remain before enemy forces topple the Estonian government. Without Langley's backing, Berlin Station acts alone in one final desperate push to prevent the fall of a nation.
